summary.span: 一个抽象类，在实现时表示支持通道 SOAP 消息安全的绑定元素。

span.span: An abstract class that, when implemented, represents a binding element that supports channel SOAP message security.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类是在 WCF 中的 SOAP 消息安全绑定元素的基类。This class is the base class for the SOAP message security binding elements in WCF. 此抽象类有三种实现：、 和 。There are three implementations of this abstract class: , , and . 这些实现为在 WS-Security Policy 规范中定义的绑定建模。These implementations model the bindings defined in the WS-Security Policy specification. 自定义绑定包含以特定顺序排列的绑定元素集合：首先添加表示绑定堆栈顶部的元素，其次是绑定堆栈的第二个元素，依此类推。A custom binding contains a collection of binding elements arranged in a specific order: the element that represents the top of the binding stack is added first, the next element down in the binding stack is added second, and so on. 若要将此类添加到绑定中，请执行下列操作：To add this class to a binding, do the following: 1. 创建 。Create a . 2. 在绑定堆栈中创建位于此绑定元素之上的自定义绑定元素，比如可选的 和 。Create a custom binding element that is above this binding element in the binding stack, such as the optional and . 3. 使用 方法，按先前描述的顺序将这些元素添加到 。Add these elements in the order previously described to the using the method. 4. 创建一个派生自 的安全绑定元素的实例，如 、 或 。Create an instance of a security binding element derived from , such as , , or . 5. 将派生的安全绑定元素添加到集合中。Add the derived security binding element to the collection. 6. 将任何其他自定义绑定元素添加到集合，比如 。Add any additional custom binding elements to the collection, such as . 有关使用，请参阅[SecurityBindingElement 身份验证模式](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/securitybindingelement-authentication-modes.md)和[如何： 自定义绑定使用 SecurityBindingElement 创建](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-create-a-custom-binding-using-the-securitybindingelement.md)。For more information about using a , see [SecurityBindingElement Authentication Modes](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/securitybindingelement-authentication-modes.md) and [How to: Create a Custom Binding Using the SecurityBindingElement](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-create-a-custom-binding-using-the-securitybindingelement.md). > [!NOTE] > 在创建了 对象后，应将其属性视为不可变。Once a object is created, you should treat its properties as immutable. 对某些属性调用 `set` 可能会产生不可预知的效果：绑定的行为可能就好像属性保留了其旧值一样，并出现运行时错误，该错误是问题的唯一迹象。Calling `set` on some properties may have unpredictable effects: the binding may behave as if the property retained its old value, with a runtime failure being the only indication of an issue. 已知具有此行为的两个属性为 和 。Two properties known to behave this way are and . 其他某些属性可能也是如此。There may be other properties of which this is also true.

summary.span: 创建一个对称安全绑定元素，该元素配置为需要进行基于客户端的 Kerberos 令牌进行客户端身份验证。

span.span: Creates a symmetric security binding element that is configured to require client authentication based on the client's Kerberos token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要执行 Kerberos 身份验证，服务器必须在注册到 Active Directory 的服务主体名称的帐户中运行。To do Kerberos authentication, the server must run in an account that has a service principal name registered with Active Directory. NetworkService 属于这种帐户。NetworkService is such an account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果版本为 WSSecurity10，则将配置绑定元素以实现客户端请求由其证书签名并使用服务器证书加密。If the version is WSSecurity10, then the binding element is configured so that the client request is signed by its certificate and encrypted with the server certificate. 如果版本为 WSSecurity11，则配置绑定元素，以实现为每个客户端请求生成新的随机对称密钥（为服务器加密），该密钥用于对请求和服务器的回应进行保护。If the version is WSSecurity11, then the binding element is configured so that a new random symmetric key (encrypted for the server) is generated for every request by the client and is used to protect the request as well as the response from the server. 客户端证书在请求时可用作认可支持令牌。The client's certificate is used as an endorsing supporting token on the request. > [!NOTE] > 通过调用此方法创建了 对象后， 属性为不可变。Once a object is created by calling this method, the property is immutable. 对它调用 `set` 不会将其改变。Calling `set` on it does not change it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `requireCancellation` 为 `false`，则颁发基于 Cookie 的安全上下文令牌；否则，颁发基于会话的安全上下文令牌。If `requireCancellation` is `false`, cookie-based security context tokens are issued; otherwise, session-based security context tokens are issued. `bootstrapSecurity` 用于指示安全绑定和策略，该绑定和策略用于向服务请求 `SecureConversationToken`。The `bootstrapSecurity` is used to indicate the security binding and policy used to request a `SecureConversationToken` from the service. 如果 `bootstrapSecurity` 是 ，则由此方法返回的绑定元素也是 `TransportSecurityBindingElement`，且 设置为 `true`；而且从 返回的 对象的 属性设置为 `false`；而且从 返回的 对象的 属性设置为 `false`。If `bootstrapSecurity` is a , the binding element returned by this method is also a `TransportSecurityBindingElement`, and is set to `true`; and the object returned from has its property set to `false`; and the object returned from has its property set to `false`. 否则将返回 ，并且 设置为 `false`。Otherwise, a is returned, with set to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 当需要在 [!INCLUDE[wxp](~/includes/wxp-md.md)] 上进行模拟时，请不要在安全会话中使用安全上下文令牌。When impersonation is required on [!INCLUDE[wxp](~/includes/wxp-md.md)], use a secure session without a security context token. 如果在模拟时使用安全上下文令牌，则会引发 。When security context tokens are used with impersonation an is thrown. 有关详细信息，请参阅[不支持的方案](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/unsupported-scenarios.md)。For more information, see [Unsupported Scenarios](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/unsupported-scenarios.md). 有关安全会话的详细信息，请参阅[安全会话](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/secure-sessions.md)。For more information about secure sessions, see [Secure Sessions](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/secure-sessions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何调用此方法。The following code shows how to call this method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持令牌除了提供包含在绑定的主令牌中的声明之外，还提供其他声明。Supporting tokens provide additional claims beyond those contained in the primary tokens for the binding. 返回的集合包含针对由终结点定义的全部操作的其他令牌参数 ()。The collection returned by the contains additional token parameters () for all operations defined by an endpoint. 主令牌参数可以在 或 （两者都继承了 类）中找到。The primary token parameters are found on either the or the (both inherit from the class). 如果是 ，则主令牌参数由 属性返回。In the case of the , the primary token parameters are returned by the property. 元素上有两个参数属性，分别是 和 属性。On the element there are two parameter properties, the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 这些属性仅指定安全令牌的类型，而不指定实际值，因此被称为参数。The properties are called parameters because they specify only the type of the security token, not the actual values. > > 支持令牌的范围可确定为终结点级别，在这种情况下，从客户端发送到服务的所有安全消息都包含支持令牌。Supporting tokens can be scoped at the endpoint level, in which case they are included in all secured messages sent by the client to the service. 此服务强制所有来自客户端安全消息包含此属性配置的支持令牌类型。The service enforces that all secured messages from the client contain the supporting token types configured by this property. > > 若要仅为某个操作（而非终结点上的全部操作）提供支持令牌，请使用 属性。To provide supporting tokens only for an operation (not all operations on an endpoint), use the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LocalServiceSettings As LocalServiceSecuritySettings

summary.span: 获取由客户端使用的特定于本地安全设置的绑定属性。

span.span: Gets the binding properties specific to local security settings used by the service.

value.span: 表示服务所使用的本地安全设置的绑定属性的 对象。

span.span: The object that represents the binding properties specific to local security settings used by the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些设置并非作为安全策略的组成部分而发布，而且不影响客户端绑定，因此是本地的。The settings are local because they are not published as part of the security policy of the service and do not affect the client's binding. 对象的下列属性有助于缓解拒绝服务 (DOS) 安全攻击：The following properties of the object can help mitigate a denial-of-service (DOS) security attack: - ：控制在执行 SPNEGO 或 SSL 协商之后服务器所缓存的有时限的 `SecurityContextToken` 的最大数量。: controls the maximum number of time-bounded `SecurityContextToken`s that are cached by the server after doing SPNEGO or SSL negotiation. - ：控制在进行 SPNEGO 或 SSL 协商之后服务器所发布的 `SecurityContextToken` 的生命周期。: controls the lifetime of the `SecurityContextToken`s that are issued by the server following SPNEGO or SSL negotiation. 在此时间期限内，服务器将缓存 `SecurityContextToken`。The server caches the `SecurityContextToken`s for this period of time. - ：控制在服务器上建立但尚未针为其处理任何应用程序消息的安全对话的最大数目。: controls the maximum number of secure conversations that are established at the server but for which no application messages have been processed. 此配额可防止客户端在服务上建立安全对话而导致服务维护每个客户端的状态，但是从不使用这些状态。This quota prevents clients from establishing secure conversations at the service, thereby causing the service to maintain state for each client, but never using them. - ：控制服务使安全对话保持活动状态（但不接收服务上的应用程序消息）的最长时间。: controls the maximum time that the service keeps a secure conversation alive without ever receiving an application message on it. 此配额可防止客户端在服务上建立安全对话而导致服务维护每个客户端的状态，但是从不使用这些状态。This quota prevents clients from establishing secure conversations at the service, thereby causing the service to maintain state for each client, but never using them. 请注意，在安全对话会话中，绑定上的 和 `ReceiveTimeout` 属性将影响会话超时。In a secure conversation session, note that both and the `ReceiveTimeout` property on the binding affect session timeout. 两个属性中时间较短者将确定何时发生超时。The shorter of the two determines when timeouts occur.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举包含下列成员：The enumeration contains the following members: - ： 项添加到安全头按照"先使用声明"的一般原则。: Items are added to the security header according to the general principle of "declare before use". - ：项以任何符合 WSS: SOAP 消息安全的顺序添加到安全头中。: Items are added to the security header in any order that conforms to WSS: SOAP Message security. - ：项以任何符合 WSS: SOAP 消息安全的顺序添加到安全头中，但安全头中的第一个元素必须是 `wsse:Timestamp` 元素。: Items are added to the security header in any order that conforms to WSS: SOAP message security except that the first element in the security header must be a `wsse:Timestamp` element. - ：项以任何符合 WSS: SOAP 消息安全的顺序添加到安全头中，但安全头中的最后一个元素必须是 `wsse:Timestamp` 元素。: Items are added to the security header in any order that conforms to WSS: SOAP message security except that the last element in the security header must be a `wsse:Timestamp` element.
